h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: These attacks can be followed up often by him raising up on his claws while holding his electric orb high. After a moment, he'll slam everything down to create a massive shockwave that you need to either run from, or dodge at just the right moment (your Pillar Stance won't save you here). The good news is this blast leaves him very vulnerable for several moments afterward, once you get the dodge timing down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
These attacks can be followed up often by him raising up on his claws while holding his electric orb high. After a moment, he'll slam everything down to create a massive shockwave that you need to either run from, or dodge at just the right moment (your Pillar Stance won't save you here). The good news is this blast leaves him very vulnerable for several moments afterward, once you get the dodge timing down.
